title: Alternate Typefaces to Helvetica Thin
content:
Hi Everyone -  
i am new to typophile and i hope you can give me some suggestions.  
I am searching for some Sans Serif Families which can be an Alternate to Helvetica.  
They should have a thin or ultra/extralight/light version too.  
Teh typeface should not look very humanistic - instead more straight! I already consider for example Akkurat/FF Din as Alternates, but i am not very satisfied.

Would be thankful for every suggestion!  
Best, Adam
author: adam b

comments.content:
Of these [Helvetica alternatives](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184802/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/helvetica-and-alternatives-to-helvetica/) Paralucent has a thin weight.

You might also want to have a look at a list of [extra light fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184802/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/extra-thin-ultra-light-fonts/).

Thank you very much, Stephen!

If someone else has any ideas - you are very welcome!

[Interstate](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184802/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ttp%3A/%252Fwww.fontbureau.com/fonts/Interstate/styles) goes all the way to thin and hairline. Plays nicely with other fonts as well.
